mapper.select: select OP_SEQ opSeq, DBOP_DATE dbopDate, MEMOP_DATE memopDate, OP_TYPE opType, TABLE_NAME tableName, TABLE_COLUMN_1 tableColumn1, TABLE_COLUMN_2 tableColumn2, TABLE_COLUMN_3 tableColumn3, TABLE_COLUMN_4 tableColumn4, TABLE_COLUMN_5 tableColumn5, TABLE_COLUMN_6 tableColumn6, NOTES notes, ROUTE_ID routeId, STATE state from user_info_bill2ctgmq where state !=1 order by OP_SEQ limit 0,1000
